description:
Hi,

We are building a large application and divind into two phases, a POC and a Beta version.

The job post is for the POC and if the person selected does a good job we will bring him onboard to the Beta which it will be 6-9 months.

This job, the POC, requires finishing the front-end of a web application on next.js, and working on connecting the backend with AWS resources (Dynamo, Lambdas, RDS, PgVector) as well as finish to build APIs to connect machine learning flows.

The application is mostly build and we want to test candidates doing this POC ahead of bringing them to the next much bigger project.

Thanks,
Diego
